name: Tenderloin
location: Tenderloin, San Francisco
description: DO NOT VISIT. Most concentrated crime area in SF â€” 2,890 crimes (678 violent). Rampant drug trafficking, assaults, open drug use, aggressive panhandling day and night.

name: SoMa
location: South of Market, San Francisco
description: High risk â€” 4,567 crimes (567 violent). Frequent car break-ins, smash-and-grab robberies, tent encampments under overpasses. Stay alert south of Market St.

name: Mission District
location: Mission District, San Francisco
description: Medium-high risk â€” 3,890 crimes (456 violent). Mugging and property theft concentrated around 16th St BART; risk increases south of 24th St, especially at night.

name: Bayview
location: Bayview-Hunters Point, San Francisco
description: DO NOT VISIT. Gang activity and shootings â€” 2,456 crimes (423 violent). Not a tourist area; locals advise visitors to stay away entirely.

name: Civic Center
location: Civic Center, San Francisco
description: High risk â€” part of Central/Downtown with 6,789 crimes (789 violent). Theft-dominant tourist/commercial zone; open drug activity around UN Plaza and City Hall after hours.

name: Union Square
location: Union Square, San Francisco
description: High risk â€” part of Central/Downtown with 6,789 crimes. Tourist-targeted pickpocketing, shoplifting, and car break-ins around the square and nearby parking garages.

name: Fisherman's Wharf
location: Fisherman's Wharf, San Francisco
description: Medium risk â€” Northern district, 3,234 crimes overall. Heavy tourist crowds attract pickpockets; car break-ins frequent in parking areas.

name: Nob Hill
location: Nob Hill, San Francisco
description: Medium risk â€” Northern district adjacent. Package theft and car break-ins spike along the Tenderloin border; keep valuables hidden.

name: Richmond District
location: Richmond District, San Francisco
description: Medium risk â€” Northern district, mixed residential area. Isolated stretches near Golden Gate Park see occasional muggings after dark.

name: Sunset District
location: Sunset District, San Francisco
description: Medium risk â€” mostly residential and safe. Car break-ins spike near Ocean Beach parking lots; keep nothing visible in your vehicle.

name: Presidio
location: Presidio, San Francisco
safetyHighlights: Large park area with steady daytime recreation traffic.
crimeTypes: Car break-ins at trailhead parking lots
description: Generally one of the safer parts of SF, especially during daytime around trails, museums, and main roads.

name: Presidio Heights
location: Presidio Heights, San Francisco
safetyHighlights: Well-lit residential area with consistently lower violent incident rates.
description: Generally considered one of SF's safer residential neighborhoods.

description: Frequently listed among safer SF neighborhoods for walking and staying.

description: Generally safer for visitors than downtown core zones, with active streets and businesses.

safetyHighlights: Smaller neighborhood feel and generally lower severe-incident reports.
